value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Plan and implement data platform resources
value.excerpt: Deploy data platform resources in Azure for SQL Server and Open Source databases. Explore options for upgrade and migration.  Calculate resource requirements and create templates.

topItems.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

topItems.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesizing text input to speech, performing speech translation, and implementing speaker recognition in your AI infused applications.

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech-to-text from the speech service,  known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

images.title: Transcribe speech input to text

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

images.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

images.title: Translate speech with the speech service
Transcribe speech input to text

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: In manufacturing, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI in the enterprise. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing

value.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy a multicontainer application to Kubernetes on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

images.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Workshop

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

images.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Azure Container Registry is a managed Docker registry service based on the open-source Docker Registry 2.0. Container Registry is private, hosted in Azure, and allows you to build, store, and manage images for all types of container deployments. Learn how to build and store container images with Azure Container Registry.

images.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

images.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

images.title: Monitor cloud resources

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Automate Azure Functions deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Azure Functions.

images.title: Automate Azure Functions deployments with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

value.title: Automate Docker container deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for Docker containers.

images.title: Automate Docker container deployments with Azure Pipelines
Automate Docker container deployments with Azure Pipelines

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP for deploying SAP solutions in Azure. In addition, you will look at the options for deploying SAP in Azure.

images.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure

value.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
value.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

images.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Explain the essential characteristics of the IoT Edge and the functionality of the IoT Edge components (modules, runtime, and cloud interface). Characterize the types of problems that you can solve with IoT Edge.  Describe how the elements of IoT Edge can be combined to solve the problem of deploying IoT applications in the cloud.

images.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge

value.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: With the recently expanded partnership between Microsoft and SAP, you can run SAP applications across development, test, and production scenarios in Azure, taking advantage of the scalability, flexibility, and cost savings of Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Explore how Azure Stream Analytics integrates with your applications or Internet of Things (IoT) devices to gain insights with real-time streaming data. Learn how to consume and analyze data streams and derive actionable results.

images.title: Work with data streams by using Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Secure administrator accounts in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn about securing administrator accounts through secure devices, dedicated administrator accounts, and just-in-time privileges.

value.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn best practices for building, hosting, and maintaining a secure repository on GitHub.

images.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices

value.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
value.excerpt: Manage your application and the packages it uses across build pipelines.

images.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts

value.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

images.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Manage an InnerSource program by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to manage a successful InnerSource program on GitHub through effective discoverability, guidance, and maintenance.

images.title: Manage an InnerSource program by using GitHub

value.title: Manage release cadence in Azure Pipelines by using deployment patterns
value.excerpt: Choose and implement a deployment pattern that helps you smoothly roll out new application features to your users.

images.title: Manage release cadence in Azure Pipelines by using deployment patterns
